sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均有"大约，差不多"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: almost, nearly, about, approximately, around, roughly
means: almost ：指在程度上相差很小，差不多。
nearly与almost含义基本相同，侧重指数量、时间或空间上的接近。
about ：常可分almost和nearly换用，但about用于表示时间、数量的"大约"时，实际数量可能多也可能少。
approximately ：多用于书面语，指精确度接近某个标准以致误差可忽略不计。
around ：多用于非正式场合，常见于美国英语。

sentence.Network_en: In the course of the 1930s steel production in Britain approximately doubled.
sentence.Network_cn: 在20世纪30年代，英国的钢铁产量几乎翻了一番。

sentence.Network_en: Approximately $150 million is to be spent on improvements.
sentence.Network_cn: 大约1.5亿美元将用于作出改善。
温室的大小大约是13英尺乘16英尺。

entry.def: An approximate number, time, or position is close to the correct number, time, or position, but is not exact.

example.ex: The approximate cost varies from around £150 to £250...
example.tran: 费用大概介于150至250英镑之间。

entry.def: An idea or description that is approximate is not intended to be precise or accurate, but to give some indication of what something is like.

example.ex: They did not have even an approximate idea what the Germans really wanted.
example.tran: 他们完全不清楚德国人真正想要什么。

entry.def: If something approximates to something else, it is similar to it but is not exactly the same.

example.ex: Something approximating to a fair outcome will be ensured...
example.tran: 保证会有大致公正的结果。

example.ex: By about 6 weeks of age, most babies begin to show something approximating a day/night sleeping pattern.
example.tran: 到6个星期大时，大多数婴儿开始表现出近似于日夜分明的睡觉模式。

means.word_mean: 1. (of quantities) imprecise but fairly close to correct;

sentences.sentence: "I've had about all I can stand"
"20 or so people were at the party"

Sentence.sentence: In the approximately 20 deep-sea crashes over the past 30 years, only one plane's black boxes were never recovered.
National Institutes of Health (NIH) Biomedical Research Workforce Working Group recommended that the NIH require IDPs for the approximately 32,000 postdoctoral researchers they support.

jushi.english: This job will take approximately two month, and cost approximately 4000 dollars.
jushi.chinese: 这项工作所需的时间大约为两个月,费用大约为4000美元。
